function_name.description: name of the function, this name will also be used for the deployed function

gcp_project_id.description: gcp project necessary if working with gcp

$comment.description: from here on properties are not required will either be generated by the testOps build or have a default

old_analyser.description: Can be set to true if old_analyser is going to be used. The function will then be deployed separatelly for each memory config, following the needed naming convention.

terraform_dir.description: directory which will be used for terraform - When using testOps for multiple projects this variable has to be used

aws_code.description: Automatically set after build with testOps. Used to store the location of the build for deployment

aws_handler.description: Handler built for the Main_class - can also be the main class itself if the Handler was manually implemented

gcp_code.description: Automatically set after build with testOps. Used to store the location of the build for deployment

gcp_handler.description: if generated by testops the aws and gcp handlers are implemented in the same class
